author: Another opinion

review: I'm posting this as an OK product because of the service I received from Amazon and although I just got it and haven't used it much yet.I received the product and got it home and could not get it to connect to my home network(COMCAST). I put in the password NUMEROUS times(YES my password was correct) and it still would not connect. I called Amazon and they, of course, walked me through several things. Those things did not work. They then assured me they would call me the next day with a solution to my problem. I then receive an email from Amazon telling me to do the same things that I had just done so I call back and was AGAIN assured someone would call me the next day. Well, the next day rolls around AND I RECEIVED NO CALL FROM AMAZON. HOWEVER, just out of curiosity, I tried to connect and low and behold it finally connected. BUT I STILL RECEIVED NO CALL FROM AMAZON AS PROMISED. I don't care if they somehow knew I was connected or not LYING TO A CUSTOMER IS NOT A GOOD WAY TO HANDLE CUSTOMER SERVICE ISSUES! I finally got connected and it kept losing signal at first until I figured out I needed to move my router---I did that and FOR NOW it seems to work fine.
author: Terrie Coleman
